imdb.title: Roringu garuzu
imdb.plot: Ten years after the Great Tokyo War, each prefecture in Japan has split up into independent nations. Each nation is ruled by a prophet called "Mosa" and an army called "Mob" as they start to compete to take over other countries. F...

episodes.title: King of Rookies
episodes.plot: Nozomi Moritomo is an average girl who just wants to help, but can a lowly Rest like her make a difference in the battle of the Bests?

episodes.title: Center of the World
episodes.plot: Nozomi and the other Hiyoshicho Propellers are trapped on a roller coaster! Can Masami save them without revealing Maccha Green's true identity?

episodes.title: I Wanna Be a Hero
episodes.plot: The girls set out to Tokyo to gather Moonlight Stones with Chiaya and find themselves in the middle of "Always Comima."

episodes.title: Dream
episodes.plot: The girls escape with the help of a Comima staff member, but a new threat appears. Can they clear their names and get Chiaya's stone back?

episodes.title: Disappointed People
episodes.plot: Aichi and Mie are up in arms and things are tense after all the shachihoko in Nagoya were blown up. Can the girls bring peace to the warring nations?

episodes.title: Lightning Speed
episodes.plot: Chiaya's back, but they lose Yukina as things come to a head in old Aichi and old Mie. How will they ever learn to coexist peacefully?

episodes.title: Give Me the Stars
episodes.plot: The girls are now in Kyoto, where the captain of the squad they are trying to help is kidnapped. Can they save the captain and the rock festival?!

episodes.title: After the Rain
episodes.plot: Misa is back where she belongs, but what happened between her and Mamechiyo? And what is Shuten up to, anyway?

episodes.title: Thieves' Gang in the Night
episodes.plot: The girls find themselves in Hiroshima by way of Okayama, but can they work through their own troubles and help the locals at the same time?

episodes.title: No No No
episodes.plot: Ai is taken in by a poor peach grower and her daughter, and Yukina is lost again. Can Nozomi help Kaguya and Kuramochi by herself? And where's Chiaya?

episodes.title: Passionate Rose
episodes.plot: Things are getting heated up in Okayama, but how is the Nayotake family involved? Will the girls be able to reunite and resolve everything?

episodes.title: Endless Song
episodes.plot: What can four Rest girls do thrown in amongst Bests and robots and aliens? In the midst of all the fighting, can the girls bring peace?
